abstract: Law enforcement officials were helped by Facebook, whose users were among those targeted by the software employed by cybercriminals in the last few years.
snippet: Law enforcement officials were helped by Facebook, whose users were among those targeted by the software employed by cybercriminals in the last few years.
lead_paragraph: International authorities, with some help from Facebook, have arrested 10 people accused of operating a network of infected computers that stole personal information from millions of victims.

headline.main: 10 Arrested in Theft of Web Data
headline.print_headline: 10 Arrested In Theft Of Web Data

byline.original: By Brian X. Chen and John H. Cushman Jr
